text: You could do it with some JavaScript/jQuery
Seconded to what <@U98RGFUQZ> said. In order to modify the HS Menu Module, you would have to use JS to do it.
are repeatable fields inside of repeatable fields possible in DM2?
it looks like you can from what I just tried (adding repeating options on a group, then adding repeating options on a field in that group)
is it possible to use the random filter with a num param? like `{% for content in contents|random(3) %}`
are you trying to get the first 3 items?
just 3 random items from the blog topic
can I ask what’s the larger goal?
Yep, showing related content on a post from 3 random topic articles (as opposed to just showing the most recent)
thanks <@UA914H7S8> - has anyone every tried creating a HubSpot menu using Bootstrap 4's css classes.
We’re working on a tag that will produce these lists efficiently. Could you share your code so make sure we capture this use case?
